SPECIFICATION REFERENCE - CTS Permit to Work
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA - Underground Services Drawings to accompany permit and marked out onsite where excavation is to be undertaken
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA - Foundations and embedded items shall be setout following the tolerances, heights and positions shown in each foundations respective drawing.
SPECIFICATION REFERENCE - CTS General Civil Construction Spec
○ CTS Contaminated Environmental Ground Soil Managenet Plan RW-231
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA - Waste management plan prepared and followed. Supporting documents available on request.
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA - Existing pedestal removed at ground level. Concrete removed to approved landfill.
P1185A - Position of Pump Pedestal Setout
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA - Setout as per IFC Drawings
P1185A - Pump pedestal location Cleaned & Scabbled
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA - Foundation area cleaned and free from contamination and dust/oil or grease, surface roughened to accept further concrete pour
P1185A - Cast in Items - Bolts & Nuts
○ CTS Epoxy Grouting of Anchor Bolts
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA - If drilled in, Epoxy Grout Shall be Ramset C8 placed in accordance with manufacturers recommendations to the levels and positions setout in the drawings
○ Drilled holes for Anchors shall be inspected
○ Cast in anchor bolts shall be set to spec in IFC drawings and positioned with template to design measurenments in IFC drawings
○ CTS General Civil Construction Specification NZS3109/3112
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA - All reinforcing bars shall be Micro-Alloy Class E to AS/NZS 4671 as shown in IFC's.
○ All reinforcing bar hooks, laps and bends shall be in accordance with NZS3109 unless otherwise noted.
○ All reinforcing and formwork to comply with IFC drawings
○ Concrete to be min 30MPa at 28 days
○ Testing of concrete per CTS Specifications
○ Prepour Inspection Record Filled out Prior to Concrete
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA - Grouting shall be Sika 212 or Sika 214 placed in accordance with manufacturers recommendations and  the IFC drawings
